titleStmt.title: The principles of the Quakers further shewn to be blasphemous and seditious in a reply to Geo. Whitehead's answer to the Brief discovery, stiled Truth and innocency vindicated / by Edward Beckham ..., Henry Meriton ..., Lancaster Topcliffe ...
titleStmt.author: Beckham, Edward, 1637 or 8-1714.
Topcliffe, Lancaster, 1646 or 7-1720.
Meriton, Henry, d. 1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
